hero.headline: Duval County's Premier Local Movers Since 1998

pricing.heroSubtext: Perfect for apartments, homes, and local relocations within 50 miles of Duval County. No hidden fees, no fuel charges, and a price-lock guarantee!

whyChooseUs.headline: Why Duval County Families Trust T&E Movers
whyChooseUs.subheadline: We're your Duval County neighbors, committed to providing a top-quality moving experience with a focus on friendly, reliable service for our diverse communities.

cards.title: Duval County Specialists
cards.description: From the Northside to the Southside, the beaches to the Westside, we know every corner of Duval County. Our local knowledge ensures an efficient and stress-free move.

cards.title: No Hidden Fees Promise
cards.description: The price we quote is the price you pay. No surprises. Our transparent pricing includes everything for a successful move in Duval County.

cards.title: Reliable & Punctual
cards.description: We respect your time and your trust. Our crews are always on time, professional, and ready to work, ensuring your Duval County move stays on schedule.

points.title: Price-Lock Guarantee
points.description: Your quote is your final price. No surprise charges, ever.

points.title: On-Time Arrival Promise
points.description: We respect your time. We arrive when scheduled, or your move is 25% off.

points.title: Zero Damage Guarantee
points.description: We guarantee zero damage to your belongings or we fix/replace at no cost to you.

testimonials.headline: Real Duval County Moving Stories
testimonials.subheadline: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what your neighbors in Duval County are saying about their experience with T&E Movers.

reviews.testimonialText: T&E Movers was a fantastic choice for our move in Mandarin. The crew was professional, hardworking, and very efficient. They made our moving day completely stress-free. We would highly recommend them to anyone in Duval County.

I was very impressed with the service from T&E Movers. They were on time, professional, and took great care of my belongings. The final price was fair and exactly what was quoted. A truly great experience.

I used T&E for my condo move at the beach and they were wonderful. The movers were friendly, fast, and very careful with my furniture. I would definitely use them again and recommend them to my neighbors.

faq.headline: Duval County Moving Questions, Answered
faq.subheadline: As Duval County's trusted local movers for over 25 years, we have the answers to all your questions about moving in our community.

items.question: How much does a local move in Duval County cost?
items.answer: Our local moves start at just $397. The final cost depends on the size of your home, distance, and any additional services. We provide transparent, upfront quotes with a price-lock guarantee.

items.question: Are you familiar with the different areas of Duval County?
items.answer: Yes, we have extensive experience moving families throughout Duval County, from the historic neighborhoods of Riverside and San Marco to the beaches and the growing suburbs. We know the county well.

items.question: Do you offer military discounts?
items.answer: Yes, we are proud to offer a discount for active-duty and retired military personnel. Please mention your service when booking your move to receive the discount.

items.question: What areas do you serve in Duval County?
items.answer: We serve all of Duval County, including Jacksonville, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, and Baldwin. We also handle moves to and from the surrounding counties.

items.question: Do you offer packing services?
items.answer: Yes, we offer both full and partial packing services. Our professional packers can handle everything, allowing you to focus on other aspects of your move.

items.question: Can you handle moves in and out of high-rise buildings?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our teams are experienced in high-rise moves and are proficient in using elevators and navigating tight spaces to ensure a safe and efficient move.

movingTips.headline: Top Tips for a Smooth Duval County Move
movingTips.subheadline: After 25 years of moving families in Northeast Florida, we know how to make your Duval County relocation a success. Here are our top tips.

tips.title: Plan for Your Neighborhood
tips.description: Whether you're moving to a historic area or a new suburb, let us know about any specific access details for a smooth moving day.

tips.title: Hire True Local Movers
tips.description: Choose a licensed and insured moving company that knows Duval County. We understand the local roads and traffic patterns to make your move efficient.

tips.title: Declutter Before Packing
tips.description: Get rid of unwanted items to reduce your load and save money. Duval County has many convenient donation centers and disposal sites.

tips.title: Label for Your New Home
tips.description: Label boxes by room and contents. This makes unpacking at your new Duval County home much faster and helps our crew place items correctly.

tips.title: Use Quality Materials
tips.description: Florida's humidity can weaken cheap boxes. We provide professional packing services and premium materials to protect your belongings.

tips.title: Protect Your Valuables
tips.description: Keep important documents, jewelry, and irreplaceable items with you during the move. Don't pack them in the moving truck.

tips.title: Schedule Utilities Early
tips.description: Arrange for utilities in Duval County to be transferred or started before moving day. You'll want that AC on and ready!

tips.title: Pack an Essentials Kit
tips.description: Pack a 'first night' box with snacks, toiletries, chargers, and a change of clothes that travels with you, not on the truck.

tips.title: Communicate With Us
tips.description: Let your T&E moving coordinator know about specialty items, access issues, or time restrictions. Clear communication is key!

tips.title: Relax & Settle In
tips.description: You're moving to a great county! Let our experienced team handle the heavy lifting so you can start enjoying your new home.

cta.headline: Ready for a Stress-Free Duval County Move?
cta.subheadline: Let our experienced team handle everything while you focus on the excitement of your new home. Get your free quote today!

finalCta.headline: Ready to Move in Duval County?
finalCta.subheadline: Join thousands of satisfied Duval County families who chose T&E Movers. Your new home is waiting - let's get you there safely and stress-free.
